item.description:
SAVE THE DATE
WEDELN 2007/2008 MEMBERSHIP AFTERNOON (PRE-PATS VS DALLAS PARTY!)
SUNDAY OCTOBER 14TH, 2:00PM
BIG CITY - ALLSTON

Interested in becoming a keyholder? Coming up as a guest for a weekend? Or you already are a keyholder and want to meet the "newbies?" Attend this event!!

In addition: Everyone that comes will get one free drink! FREE pool, some munchy aps, and a raffle for an IPOD!

Please, if you have any questions, call me anytime at 617-285-5222. Otherwise, I can't wait to see all of you during the next few weekends at one our many events. The social calendar is full!

Regards,
Julie Ochse
Wedeln Membership
julie_ochse@yahoo.com
item.name: Wedeln 2007/2008 Membership Afternoon (pre-Pats vs Dallas Party!)
